author: pipermerriam
content:
I've started working on a standalone implementation of discv5 in python.  Code can be found here:

https://github.com/ethereum/ddht/

I'll be working over the next week or two to bring it up-to-date with the bleeding edge spec found here: https://github.com/ethereum/devp2p/pull/157

I'll be using the `TALKREQ/TALKRESP` messages to implement some version of the messages needed to pass `key/value` content around the network.
